description: Get started by contributing to open source projects with a wide range of technology stack - Such as React
Join our sprint based design sessions on Discord. Learn about UX Design, UI Design/Dev, Design Systems Engineering, Graphic Design and building some cool stuff
We actively participate in MLH organized hackathons and events. Join localhub guild and learn through building cool projects - Build your project portfolio
Join us in offline meetups where we connect in person with all the community members. Checkout for upcoming offline meetups.
A small and fun gallery of our online/offline meetups, team outings, events and hackathons we've been to.
